sentence in indonesian using the words: Suhu di luar sangat panas, mencapai 90 derajat Fahrenheit.
english translation: The temperature outside is very hot, reaching 90 degrees Fahrenheit.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong kirimkan dokumen penting ini lewat faksimile.
english translation: Please send this important document via fax.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya dilahirkan pada tanggal 14 Februari.
english translation: I was born on February 14th.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sekolah saya mengadakan festival tahunan setiap bulan Juli.
english translation: My school holds an annual festival every July.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka menonton filem romantis.
english translation: I like watching romantic films.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Fisika adalah cabang ilmu pengetahuan yang mempelajari materi, energi, dan pergerakan mereka.
english translation: Physics is a branch of science that studies matter, energy, and their movements.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya tidak bisa datang ke kantor karena flu.
english translation: I can't come to the office because of the flu.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya perlu mengisi formulir pernyataan sebelum memulai kerja.
english translation: I need to fill out a statement form before starting work.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bisakah Anda mengirimkan foto keluarga Anda?
english translation: Can you send me a photo of your family?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka menjelajahi dan memotret alam dengan kamera digital saya.
english translation: I like exploring and taking pictures of nature with my digital camera.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya memetik frambos segar dari taman belakang.
english translation: I picked fresh raspberries from my backyard garden.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kita sering melihat gagak di pepohonan di dekat rumah.
english translation: We often see crows in the trees near our house.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Gagang telepon rusak, jadi saya harus membeli baru.
english translation: The phone handle is broken, so I have to buy a new one.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya pernah mengunjungi pertunjukan sirkus di mana ada gajah yang tampil.
english translation: I once visited a circus show where elephants performed.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sangat senang dengan kenaikan gaji saya bulan ini.
english translation: I'm very happy with my salary increase this month.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sekarang saya merasa tidak nyaman karena anjing tetangga yang sangat galak.
english translation: Now I feel uncomfortable because of the neighbor's ferocious dog.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya melihat gambar pemandangan yang sangat indah di internet.
english translation: I saw a very beautiful landscape picture on the internet.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Roti tawar yang saya beli dari toko itu menggunakan gandum organik.
english translation: The white bread I bought from that store uses organic wheat.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami menggunakan ganjalan kaki di kamarnya supaya lebih nyaman.
english translation: We use a footstool in her room to make it more comfortable.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya memasang gantungan baju di dinding untuk menjaga pakaiannya tetap rapi.
